```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv2("cycling.csv", col_types = "cncccccccccccc")

nrow(df)
unique(df$qid) 
```

## remove the extra 10th of seconds (?) from some of the timestamps

```{r}
ix <- grepl(pattern = "^[0-9]{10}$", df$ts)

df <- df %>% 
  mutate(ts = ifelse(ix, ts, as.numeric(str_sub(ts, 1, 10))))

head(df, 30)
```
